author: Mattia Lombardi
description: A short and lightly bitter aperitif-style cocktail with an attractive golden, almost sunny appearance.
name: Once Upon A Time
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
